alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 3:45AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Jackson County through 515 AM EDT... At 345 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Albion, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jackson... Brooklyn... Grass Lake... Vandercook Lake... Leoni... Spring Arbor... Napoleon... Sandstone... Norvell... Pulaski... Concord... Horton... Springport... Parma... Hanover... Rives Junction... Sunset Beach... Michigan Center... Jackson County Airpo... Oak Point... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
